discourse_list.title: October's Monthly MIPs Governance Poll is Live. Go Vote!

content.content: The Monthly MIPs Governance Poll (October) Live Poll (Vote Here)   The Governance Poll will run until October 22 at 4 pm UTC. Review (Bundled Proposals Details) MIPs  MIP14: Protocol Dai Transfer MIP20: Target Price Adjustment Module (Vox) MIP21: Real World Assets - Off-Chain Asset Backed Lender MIP22: Centrifuge Direct Liquidation Module MIP23: Domain Structure and Roles  Subproposals  MIP13c3-SP3: Declaration of Intent - Strategic Reserves Fund MIP13c3-SP4 Declaration of Intent & Commercial Points - Off-Chain Asset Backed Lender to onboard Real World Assets as Collateral for a DAI loan MIP13c3-SP5: Declaration of Intent: Maker to commence onboarding work of Centrifuge based Collateral  Next Steps  MKR holders must vote to determine whether to accept or reject the bundle of proposals included within the Monthly Governance Poll, determining whether the bundle should proceed to the final ratification vote (Executive Vote) in the last week of the monthly Governance Cycle. The Executive Vote will be submitted on October 26, 2020, if the Governance Facilitator confirms a ‘yes’ outcome of the Monthly Governance Poll on the next Governance and Risk call on October 22, 2020.
This topic was automatically closed 7 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
